violations.description: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
violations.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

nodes.html: <a class="nav-link dropdown-toggle mr-3 js-searchToggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-expanded="false"

violations.description: Ensure all ARIA attributes have valid values
violations.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

nodes.html: <button type="button" id="play-pause" class="btn btn-sm" aria-controls="play/pause" tabindex="2">Pause</button>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Invalid ARIA attribute value: aria-controls="play/pause"

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

violations.description: Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
violations.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has a tabindex greater than 0
